models.figura package

Submodules

models.figura.enemy module

class models.figura.enemy.Enemy(name: str)

Bases: NPC

A class representing an Enemy, inheriting from the NPC (Non-Player Character) class.

Variables:

  • name (str) – The name of the enemy.

  • _hp (int) – The health points (HP) of the enemy.

__init__(self, name

str): Initializes an Enemy instance with a given name and sets initial HP to 1.

attack(self)

Placeholder method for enemy attacks.

take_hit(self, damage

int): Reduces the enemy’s health points by the given damage.

attack() → None

Placeholder method for enemy attacks.

property hp: int

Get the current health points of the enemy.

take_hit(damage: int) → None

Reduces the enemy’s health points by the given damage.

Raises:

  • If the health points fall to or below zero, raises an exception –

  • indicating game over. –

models.figura.npc module

class models.figura.npc.NPC(name: str)

Bases: object

A class representing a Non-Player Character (NPC).

Variables:

name (str) – The name of the NPC.

__init__(self, name

str): Initializes an NPC instance with a given name.

talk(self)

Placeholder method for NPC dialogue or communication.

receive(self, item

str): Receives an item from the protagonist.

property name: str

Get NPC name

Get item from protagonist.

Parameters:

item (str) – item which NPC receive.

talk() → None

Placeholder method for NPC dialogue or communication.

models.figura.protagonist module

class models.figura.protagonist.Protagonist(name: str)

Bases: object

Representing the main character (protagonist) in a text-based adventure game.

Variables:

  • command_db (CommandDAO) – An instance of the CommandDAO class for handling game commands.

  • name (str) – The name of the protagonist.

  • hp (int) – The health points (HP) of the protagonist.

  • xp (int) – The experience points (XP) of the protagonist.

  • inventory (defaultdict) – A defaultdict representing the inventory of the protagonist.

  • curr_location (int) – The current location ID of the protagonist.

  • line_id (int) – The current dialogue line ID of the protagonist.

__init__(self, name

str): Initializes a Protagonist instance with the given name and default attributes.

go(self, direction

Direction): Moves the protagonist to the next location based on the given direction.

whereami(self)

Returns the current location ID of the protagonist.

talk_to(self, npc

NPC): Placeholder method for interacting with NPCs through dialogue.

attack(self, enemy

Enemy): Placeholder method for attacking enemies.

advance_xp(self, value

int = 1): Advances the experience points of the protagonist by the specified value.

heal(self, value

int = 1): Heals the protagonist by the specified amount.

take_hit(self, damage

int = 1): Inflicts damage to the protagonist, handling game over if HP drops to zero.

take(self, item

str): Adds an item to the protagonist’s inventory.

give(self, npc

NPC, item: str): Gives an item from the protagonist’s inventory to an NPC.

show_inventory(self) → List

Returns a list of items in the protagonist’s inventory.

use_attributes(self)

Uses certain attributes (heals, advances XP, consumes an item) based on game logic.

advance_xp(value: int = 1) → None

Advances the experience points of the protagonist by the specified value.

Parameters:

value (int) – The amount by which to advance the experience points (default is 1).

attack(enemy: Enemy) → None

Placeholder method for attacking enemies.

Parameters:

enemy (Enemy) – The enemy to attack.

property curr_location: int

Get protagonist current location

give(npc: NPC, item: str) → None

Gives an item from the protagonist’s inventory to an NPC.

Parameters:

  • npc (NPC) – The NPC to give the item to.

  • item (str) – The item to give.

Moves the protagonist to the next location based on the given direction.

Parameters:

direction (Direction) – The direction in which the protagonist is moving.

The new dialogue line ID.
